member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15CheckPfx
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Checks the kind of key being used to sign an assembly. If the key is a PFX, exports the SNK from it, sets the to the path of this key and sets the property to true

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15CheckPfx.KeyFile
member.summary: Full path to the key file.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15CheckPfx.PublicKeyFile
member.summary: After task execution, gets the full path to the public key.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15CheckPfx.PostSharpKeyFile
member.summary: After task execution, gets the full path of the key that should be used to sign the assembly after PostSharp.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15CheckPfx.SignAfterPostSharp
member.summary: After task exection, determines whether the assembly should be signed after PostSharp execution.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15GetCurrentProjectDirectory
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Gets the directory containing the current project or targets file.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15GetCurrentProjectDirectory.Directory
member.summary: After task execution, gets the directory containing the project or target file that invoked the task.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15MoveWithRetry
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Move or rename a file and retries the operation during a defined amount of time in case that a sharing violation exception occurs.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15MoveWithRetry.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the source file path.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15MoveWithRetry.Destination
member.summary: Gets or sets the target file path.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15MoveWithRetry.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout, in milliseconds, for the whole operation.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Execute PostSharp.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the assembly to be processed.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.InputReferenceDirectory
member.summary: Directory according to which the property should be resolved, if a relative filename is given in .

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.Verbose
member.summary: Determines whether tracing is enabled.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.Project
member.summary: Gets or sets the PostSharp project to be executed. Required.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters passed to the PostSharp project.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.NoLogo
member.summary: Indicates that the PostSharp tag line should not be printed.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.AutoUpdateDisabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the AutoUpdate check is disabled.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.AttachDebugger
member.summary: If true, the method . will be invoked before the execution of PostSharp, given the opportunity to attach a debugger to the building process.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15.DisableReflection
member.summary: If true, user assemblies will not be loaded into the CLR. This behavior is typically desired when user assemblies are linked against the Compact Framework or Silverlight.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15Sign
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Signs an assembly using the sn utility.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15Sign.KeyFile
member.summary: Full path of the file containing the strong name key.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15Sign.Assembly
member.summary: Full path of the assembly to be signed.

member.name: T:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15TouchWithDelay
member.summary: [MSBuild Task] Touches a file according to the modification time of another file.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15TouchWithDelay.Files
member.summary: Gets or sets the files to be touched. Required.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15TouchWithDelay.Delay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay w.r.t. .
member.value: The number of milliseconds. Default is 1000.

member.name: P:PostSharp.MSBuild.PostSharp15TouchWithDelay.ReferenceFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file giving the reference time.
